sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: Exclusive: Susquehanna crypto CEO departs to lead $671 million Avalanche treasury company
feed.summary: Bart Smith, former head of Susquehanna's crypto arm, will lead Avalanche Treasury Co., a new $671 million company focused on stockpiling Avalanche cryptocurrency. The firm plans to go public on Nasdaq in Q1 2026 via a SPAC, Mountain Lake Acquisition Corp., and aims to own over $1 billion in Avalanche tokens. This move highlights the growing trend of digital asset treasuries, inspired by Michael Saylor's MicroStrategy.
